Grand Master Rivian: Welcome to the Elven Embassy. I am the ambassador, Grand Master Rivian! The more I see of this place, the more it reminds me of my home, Innadril. We have a large population, a busting economy, ample supplies, even a hidden conspiracy... I do not think it was an accident that we Elves -- and myself in particular -- are here at this moment in time. I feel the threads of our collective destiny pulling tight...
